Overview

This directory contains the documentation for Intel® Threading Building Blocks.

Files

Full documentation map
INSTALL.txt
Detailed installation instructions
Release_Notes.txt
Release notes for this release
Getting_Started.pdf
Getting started guide
Tutorial.pdf
Tutorial
Reference.pdf
Reference manual
html/index.html
Class hierarchy documentation
examples folder
Examples of how to use the library.
